Support from Azure

We provide the following supports to our users:

  Supported or not
Billing and Subscription Management
Service Dashboard
Web Event Submission
Unlimited Disruption/Restoration
Telephone Support
ICP Registration Support

Support Scope

  • Disruption/restore issues are the issues that users have encountered when using Azure and are confirmed to be caused by the platform.
  • We support all the Azure services that are publicly available online, as well as non-Microsoft technologies (e.g. the sample codes of Azure SDK and Python ) provided by Microsoft as part of Azure product functions.

Working Time

  • Technical Support:
    • The severity category is Level A (emergency event): 24 x 7;
    • The severity category is Level B/C:
      • Technical support of the platform: 9:00 - 00:00 (all year round);
      • Technical support of development: 9:00 - 00:00 (working days only).
  • Billing, subscription and quota management support; product consulting and pre-sales support; ICP register support: 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. on working days.

Note: The time above is Beijing time (UTC + 8)
